product_name: Grivel Gamma Easy Quickdraw Set - Package of 5
long_description: The Grivel Gamma Easy quickdraw set combines lightweight wiregate carabiners with a semirigid sling for fast ascents of challenging sport climbs. Wiregate carabiners on each end are color coded so you always clip the same 'biner to the bolt, keeping the rope-end 'biner smooth. 11cm Dyneema sling is light and strong; sling cover gives the quickdraw just the right amount of rigidity to make clipping easy and fast. Cover also protects the sling from abrasion and keeps the carabiners properly oriented. Package includes 5 Grivel Gamma Easy quickdraws.
short_description: The Grivel Gamma Easy quickdraw set combines lightweight wiregate carabiners with a semirigid sling for fast ascents of challenging sport climbs.
